name: BITONE
description: The BITONE (BIO) project is a block chain project in which data that needs to be guaranteed integrity is stored in the block chain using the IPFS method, and numerous audit nodes verify the integrity of the data. BITONE supports the issuance of smart contracts, web-based APIs, unity3D SDK for game industries, and NFT coin issuance for offline industries so that developers in each industry can apply it easily and conveniently.
